header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Dedicated professional with over six years of experience in collaborative team environments requiring excellent communication, problem-solving, and customer service skills. Proven track record of adapting quickly to new situations, building positive relationships, and maintaining high standards of quality and efficiency.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Collaborated with over 50 different teams to understand their needs, answer questions, and provide solutions in a fast-paced environment serving millions of users
Communicated complex information clearly to non-technical stakeholders through written documentation, presentations, and one-on-one conversations
Managed competing priorities and maintained attention to detail while working on multiple projects simultaneously

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.detail: Thrived in a fast-paced startup environment with constantly changing priorities and diverse responsibilities
Built strong working relationships with team members and management through clear communication and reliable follow-through
Identified opportunities to improve efficiency and implemented process improvements that saved time and reduced errors

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Worked directly with construction project stakeholders to understand their needs and delivered solutions that improved their daily workflows
Maintained organized records and documentation to ensure consistency and reliability across team projects
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including designers, managers, and other departments to achieve shared goals

experience.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
experience.detail: Ensured consistent quality standards through meticulous attention to detail and systematic testing procedures
Created clear and organized documentation that helped team members understand and follow established processes
Communicated findings and recommendations effectively to management and development teams to drive improvements
